Body:
[db.session.add(Post()) for _ in range(1132)]
db.session.commit()
db.session.remove()
assert Pagination(query=Post.query).items == Post.query.limit(10).offset(0
    ).all()
assert Pagination(query=Post.query, page=1).items == Post.query.limit(10
    ).offset(10).all()
pagination = Pagination(query=Post.query, page=114)
assert pagination.page == 113
pagination = Pagination(query=Post.query, page=-1)
assert pagination.page == 0
